verses.verse: וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said דָּוִד֙ <WH1732> And David אֶל־ <WH413> to himself לִבּ֔וֹ <WH3820> in his heart עַתָּ֛ה <WH6258> Now אֶסָּפֶ֥ה <WH5595> I shall now perish יוֹם־ <WH3117> day אֶחָ֖ד <WH259> one בְּיַד־ <WH3027> by the hand שָׁא֑וּל <WH7586> of Saul אֵֽין־ <WH369> There לִ֨י ט֜וֹב <WH2896> [there is] nothing better כִּ֣י <WH3588> for me than that הִמָּלֵ֥ט <WH4422> I should speedily אִמָּלֵ֣ט ׀ <WH4422> escape אֶל־ <WH413> into אֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> into the land פְּלִשְׁתִּ֗ים <WH6430> of the Philistines וְנוֹאַ֨שׁ <WH2976> shall despair מִמֶּ֤נִּי <WH4480> at שָׁאוּל֙ <WH7586> and Saul לְבַקְשֵׁ֤נִי <WH1245> of me to seek עוֹד֙ <WH5750> anymore בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all גְּב֣וּל <WH1366> me any more in any coast יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel וְנִמְלַטְתִּ֖י <WH4422> so shall I escape מִיָּדֽוֹ׃ <WH3027> out of his hand

וַיָּ֣קָם <WH6965> arose דָּוִ֔ד <WH1732> And David וַיַּעֲבֹ֣ר <WH5674> and he passed over ה֔וּא <WH1931> he וְשֵׁשׁ־ <WH8337> with the six מֵא֥וֹת <WH3967> hundred אִ֖ישׁ <WH376> men אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who עִמּ֑וֹ <WH5973> with אֶל־ <WH413> about אָכִ֥ישׁ <WH397> that [were] with him unto Achish בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son מָע֖וֹךְ <WH4582> of Maoch מֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> king גַּֽת׃ <WH1661> of Gath

וַיֵּשֶׁב֩ <WH3427> dwelt דָּוִ֨ד <WH1732> And David עִם־ <WH5973> with אָכִ֥ישׁ <WH397> with Achish בְּגַ֛ת <WH1661> at Gath ה֥וּא <WH1931> he וַאֲנָשָׁ֖יו <WH376> every man אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> each וּבֵית֑וֹ <WH1004> with his household דָּוִד֙ <WH1732> [even] David וּשְׁתֵּ֣י <WH8147> with his two נָשָׁ֔יו <WH802> wives אֲחִינֹ֙עַם֙ <WH293> Ahinoam הַיִּזְרְעֵאלִ֔ית <WH3159> the Jezreelitess וַאֲבִיגַ֥יִל <WH26> and Abigail אֵֽשֶׁת־ <WH802> wife נָבָ֖ל <WH5037> Nabal's הַֽכַּרְמְלִֽית׃ <WH3762> the Carmelitess

וַיֻּגַּ֣ד <WH5046> And it was told לְשָׁא֔וּל <WH7586> Saul כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for בָרַ֥ח <WH1272> was fled דָּוִ֖ד <WH1732> that David גַּ֑ת <WH1661> to Gath וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> no [יֹוסַף כ] (יָסַ֥ף <WH3254> add ק) ע֖וֹד <WH5750> again לְבַקְשֽׁוֹ׃ <WH1245> and he sought ס

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said דָּוִ֜ד <WH1732> And David אֶל־ <WH413> to אָכִ֗ישׁ <WH397> unto Achish אִם־ <WH518> If נָא֩ <WH4994> now מָצָ֨אתִי <WH4672> If I have now found חֵ֤ן <WH2580> grace בְּעֵינֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH5869> in thine eyes יִתְּנוּ־ <WH5414> let them give לִ֣י מָק֗וֹם <WH4725> me a place בְּאַחַ֛ת <WH259> in some עָרֵ֥י <WH5892> town הַשָּׂדֶ֖ה <WH7704> in the country וְאֵ֣שְׁבָה <WH3427> that I may dwell שָּׁ֑ם <WH8033> there וְלָ֨מָּה <WH4100> why יֵשֵׁ֧ב <WH3427> dwell עַבְדְּךָ֛ <WH5650> there for why should thy servant בְּעִ֥יר <WH5892> city הַמַּמְלָכָ֖ה <WH4467> in the royal עִמָּֽךְ׃ <WH5973> with

וַיִּתֶּן־ <WH5414> gave ל֥וֹ אָכִ֛ישׁ <WH397> Then Achish בַּיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> that day הַה֖וּא <WH1931> he אֶת־ <WH853> צִֽקְלָ֑ג <WH6860> him Ziklag לָכֵ֞ן <WH3651> therefore הָיְתָ֤ה <WH1961> has צִֽקְלַג֙ <WH6860> wherefore Ziklag לְמַלְכֵ֣י <WH4428> pertaineth unto the kings יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> of Judah עַ֖ד <WH5704> against הַיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> unto this day הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> to this פ

וַֽיְהִי֙ <WH1961> become מִסְפַּ֣ר <WH4557> the number הַיָּמִ֔ים <WH3117> was a full year אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after יָשַׁ֥ב <WH3427> dwelt דָּוִ֖ד <WH1732> that David בִּשְׂדֵ֣ה <WH7704> in the country פְלִשְׁתִּ֑ים <WH6430> of the Philistines יָמִ֖ים <WH3117> was a year וְאַרְבָּעָ֥ה <WH702> and four חֳדָשִֽׁים׃ <WH2320> months

וַיַּ֤עַל <WH5927> went up דָּוִד֙ <WH1732> And David וַֽאֲנָשָׁ֔יו <WH582> and his men וַֽיִּפְשְׁט֛וּ <WH6584> and invaded אֶל־ <WH413> about הַגְּשׁוּרִ֥י <WH1651> the Geshurites [וְהַגִּרְזִי כ] (וְהַגִּזְרִ֖י <WH1511> Gezrites ק) וְהָעֲמָלֵקִ֑י <WH6003> and the Amalekites כִּ֣י <WH3588> for הֵ֜נָּה <WH2007> for those יֹשְׁב֤וֹת <WH3427> the inhabitants הָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <WH776> of the land אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> from מֵֽעוֹלָ֔ם <WH5769> [nations were] of old בּוֹאֲךָ֥ <WH935> as thou goest שׁ֖וּרָה <WH7793> to Shur וְעַד־ <WH5704> far אֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> even unto the land מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <WH4714> of Egypt

וְהִכָּ֤ה <WH5221> smote דָוִד֙ <WH1732> And David אֶת־ <WH853> הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> the land וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> and did not יְחַיֶּ֖ה <WH2421> alive אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> and left neither man וְאִשָּׁ֑ה <WH802> nor woman וְלָקַח֩ <WH3947> and took away צֹ֨אן <WH6629> the sheep וּבָקָ֜ר <WH1241> and the oxen וַחֲמֹרִ֤ים <WH2543> and the asses וּגְמַלִּים֙ <WH1581> and the camels וּבְגָדִ֔ים <WH899> and the apparel וַיָּ֖שָׁב <WH7725> and returned וַיָּבֹ֥א <WH935> and came אֶל־ <WH413> to אָכִֽישׁ׃ <WH397> to Achish

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said אָכִ֔ישׁ <WH397> And Achish אַל־ <WH408> Whither פְּשַׁטְתֶּ֖ם <WH6584> have ye made a road הַיּ֑וֹם <WH3117> age וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said דָּוִ֗ד <WH1732> David עַל־ <WH5921> Against נֶ֤גֶב <WH5045> Against the south יְהוּדָה֙ <WH3063> of Judah וְעַל־ <WH5921> and against נֶ֣גֶב <WH5045> and against the south הַיַּרְחְמְאֵלִ֔י <WH3397> of the Jerahmeelites וְאֶל־ <WH413> and against נֶ֖גֶב <WH5045> and against the south הַקֵּינִֽי׃ <WH7017> of the Kenites

וְאִ֨ישׁ <WH376> neither man וְאִשָּׁ֜ה <WH802> nor woman לֹֽא־ <WH3808> did not יְחַיֶּ֣ה <WH2421> saved דָוִ֗ד <WH1732> And David לְהָבִ֥יא <WH935> to bring גַת֙ <WH1661> [tidings] to Gath לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> saying פֶּן־ <WH6435> Otherwise יַגִּ֥דוּ <WH5046> Lest they should tell עָלֵ֖ינוּ <WH5921> about לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> on us saying כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> So עָשָׂ֤ה <WH6213> So did דָוִד֙ <WH1732> David וְכֹ֣ה <WH3541> and so מִשְׁפָּט֔וֹ <WH4941> and so [will be] his manner כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַ֨יָּמִ֔ים <WH3117> all the while אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> he יָשַׁ֖ב <WH3427> he dwelleth בִּשְׂדֵ֥ה <WH7704> in the country פְלִשְׁתִּֽים׃ <WH6430> of the Philistines

וַיַּאֲמֵ֥ן <WH539> believed אָכִ֖ישׁ <WH397> And Achish בְּדָוִ֣ד <WH1732> David לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying הַבְאֵ֤שׁ <WH887> utterly הִבְאִישׁ֙ <WH887> to abhor בְּעַמּ֣וֹ <WH5971> He hath made his people בְיִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> Israel וְהָ֥יָה <WH1961> will become לִ֖י לְעֶ֥בֶד <WH5650> him therefore he shall be my servant עוֹלָֽם׃ <WH5769> for ever פ
